abstract: After losing at least one top deputy, Carl C. Icahn expects to keep another, Vincent J. Intrieri, through the end of 2013, but his employment agreement has quietly been changed.
snippet: After losing at least one top deputy, Carl C. Icahn expects to keep another, Vincent J. Intrieri, through the end of 2013, but his employment agreement has quietly been changed.

headline.main: Icahn Locks In a Deputy With a New Contract
